name: Avulzor
description: Avulzor is a large aberration that wears a kilt made of bones. It features a robust physique with excellent defensive attributes and possesses the ability to manipulate bones.
memorable: Avulzor can animate and enhance the capabilities of skeletons, commanding them in battle while directly confronting foes.
goals: To manipulate and command undead forces, exert control over the battlefield, and leverage tactical advantages in combat.
relations: Avulzor is likely to lead armies of undead and could be encountered alongside other necromancers or undead creatures.
environment: Usually found in dark places, tombs, or locations of significant death.
strengths: Immunities to necrotic damage and advantages in command over undead allies, making it a daunting opponent.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to magical attacks, particularly those that are potent against aberrations.
attacks: Utilizes claw and synchronized bite attacks, capable of inflicting slashing and piercing damage with strong hit bonuses.
most_powerful_ability: Bone Shaping allows Avulzor to manipulate and enhance its skeletal minions significantly, altering their functionality and combat abilities.
equipment: Bone Kilt that enhances its Armor Class and allows the creation of skeletons.
senses: Passive Perception of 16 reflects its keen awareness of its surroundings.
skills: Proficient in Arcana, allowing it to excel in intelligence-related checks.
additional_information: Can control up to three animated skeletons at a time.
Bone Shaping provides versatile modifications to skeletons.
Turning Defiance grants advantage on saving throws to nearby undead.
Multiattack technique allows multiple offensive options in combat.
Possesses high Strength and Intelligence, enhancing its combat and magical effectiveness.
